sentences.en: Frost's style appears simple and conversational, his poems are always carefully constructed.
sentences.cn: 佛洛斯特的文风通俗朴实,朗朗上口, 他的诗歌结构十分严谨.

sentences.en: He had thus far succeeded in fending off my conversational sallies.
sentences.cn: 他迄今为止一直不为我说的俏皮话所动。

sentences.en: He tried to maintain an ordinary , conversational, descriptive tone.
sentences.cn: 他竭力保持着一种平常谈话般的, 平铺直叙的语气.

sentences.en: Her tone was mild, almost conversational.
sentences.cn: 她的语气很温和, 几乎就像在谈话一般.

sentences.en: In conversational English " is not " often contracts to " isn't ".
sentences.cn: 口头英语中is not 常缩写为 isn ‘ t.

sentences.en: It has been said that Thoreau's style is conversational.
sentences.cn: 有人说梭罗的文章娓娓动听.

sentences.en: Mary is ambitious enough to aspire to conversational fluency in Chinese in four months.
sentences.cn: 玛丽雄心很大,竟想在四个月里学会用汉语流利地会话.

sentences.en: Mary is ambitious enough to aspire to conversational fluency in Chinese in two months.
sentences.cn: 玛丽雄心很大,竟想在两个月里学会用汉语流利地会话.

sentences.en: Nim strove to keep his tone conversational and easy.
sentences.cn: 尼姆努力使自己的语气随便一些.

sentences.en: She values herself on her conversational powers.
sentences.cn: 她常夸耀自己的能言善辩.

sentences.en: The article is written in a conversational style.
sentences.cn: 该文是以对话的形式写成的.

sentences.en: The article was written in straight-forward, almost conversational language.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章用简单易懂、几乎是谈话式的语言写成。

sentences.en: Tone: do we want to be formal or conversational with our requests?
sentences.cn: 语调: 我们在表达要求时,是需要严正措辞还是套个熟络的?

sentences.en: Visitors were amazed at the students'conversational fluency in English.
sentences.cn: 访问者对学生们流利的英语感到惊讶.

sentences.en: What is refreshing is the author's easy, conversational style.
sentences.cn: 让人耳目一新的是作者轻松自如的会话式写作风格。

phrases.tran_cn: 会话含义，言外之意；会话含意

trans.tran_cn: 会话的，谈话的，健谈的，善应酬的，[计]对话的，双向的
trans.tran_en: a conversational style, phrase etc is informal and commonly used in conversation
